body: Thank you, Mostapha! Adding to the previous demo file, it seems that three different total radiation values can be calculated depending on the component used, and the difference can be as high as 3%: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/z6oYvgD0qBF1W1Hht1NiNu*skCjhyhPmqhhFpRtGW7ViNSlAxpw-2Q2P8ebYjefbbPQCmlbZjCooNVRpRojs3NpwFjwIOItp/Image30.png)
